name: Heat Destroyer
description:
This game-Heat Destroyer  is based on action and survival. Inspired by the slow motion mechanics and graphics of superhot. There in total nine levels in the game with different map each. There are two introductory levels in the beginning were you get to understand how the whole game works. Also all the instructions are available in the "how to" section of  the game[ do read it once before entering the game]. There are in  total six main levels and at the end your reach the ENDLESS. Reach the portal to level up.

The game is developed by Anish Gorai and Adrish Ghorai in UNITY 2019.

Installation Instruction

  1. First Download the file.
  2. After downloading you would have a .zip file.
  3. Simply open the zip file and drag down all folders and files in your desktop(or any other location), or just simply extract it in other location.(You need all the folders and files in one folder so to play the game, do not delete or change location of one or more file, for being organised extract all items in one folder)
  4. Last, to play game, just CLICK the .exe file. And there you go.
